MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G76 postcode area of Clarkston. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am to safely carry out repair work on our underground cable network on Summerhill Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:48 AM on Tuesday, 02 February 2021
